Name: Space Hotel
About the game: One of your ship's engines breaks down while on a trade route. You are forced to make a landing in the nearest star system Merope, constellation Pleiades. Your task is to find a way to the main hangar and escape on the ship of those who remained there forever. Features: First person survival horror Atmosphere Best screamer Best graphics
